description: This Kotlin source file defines a UI fragment class 'MQTTFragment' for an Android application. It manages MQTT connections, subscription, publication, and displays logs related to MQTT activities. The nested 'MqttVM' ViewModel class handles MQTT manager interactions and lifecycle.

classes.name: MQTTFragment
classes.description: A Fragment class providing UI controls for MQTT operations such as connect, disconnect, subscribe, publish, and logs display.

classes.name: MQTTFragment.MqttVM
classes.description: A ViewModel class managing MQTT connection state and log entries, encapsulating the 'MqttManager' instance.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI elements, sets up event listeners for MQTT control buttons, binds LiveData observers, and populates default configuration values.

methods.name: initIfNeeded
methods.description: Initializes the MQTT manager if it hasn't been initialized yet, using the application context.

methods.name: onCleared
methods.description: Cleans up resources by disconnecting the MQTT manager when the ViewModel is cleared.
